name: spo-deploy-microsoft-clarity-from-csv
title: Deploy Microsoft Clarity Application Customizer for Site Collections
shortDescription: Deploy and activate the Microsoft Clarity SPFx application customizer to a specific set of sites listed in a csv for a Microsoft Clarity project.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Deploy Microsoft Clarity Application Customizer for Site Collections

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
